articles.description: The Batman has reached three-quarters of a billion dollars at the worldwide box office, making it the highest-grossing film of 2022 so far. Meanwhile, the Fantastic Beasts sequel disappointed.
articles.content:
The global hit The Batman scored its latest milestone over the weekend when it passed the $750 million mark at the global box office.

articles.title: New Fantastic Beasts just barely beats Sonic 2 at the weekend box office - The A.V. Club
articles.description: The new wizard movie knocked Sonic off of the top spot, but he might take it back
